alert.note: Alert for Central Brewster County; Lower Brewster County (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 25 at 8:53PM CDT by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Brewster County through 1000 PM CDT... At 853 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 13 miles east of Persimmon Gap, or 25 miles northeast of Panther Junction, moving north at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Persimmon Gap and Big Bend National Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for southwestern Texas.

area.areaDesc: Central Brewster County; Lower Brewster County
